location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Francis Warden, Chief Secretary to the Government of Bombay, to William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter from Francis Warden, Chief Secretary to the Government of Bombay, to William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire, acknowledging the receipt of some dispatches (not included), and informing that these were forwarded to Bengal.
